attributes.action: Lift the ban on IVF funding in warrington
attributes.additional_details: Warrington currently have a ban on IVF funding, so anyone who has a warrington postcode cannot get IVF without paying for it privately. Even though we pay tax, NI contributions, council tax etc just like everyone else, we are still not entitled to it. How is this fair? Surely its against our human rights?

rejection.details: This is a local issue.  Please resubmit your petition stating what you want the Government to do.
